title: Looking for team that doesn't flame or get super salty, just after fun and maybe ranked.
body: Hey guys and girls, just a normal player looking for a team to get into that isn't super toxic, I don't mind a little salt but when its over done its horrible, flaming is a big no no also. I play normals as I don't have enough champs to go into ranked quite yet, (started a new account to play some games with a mate who was lower level, decided to make it my main account after I got 30 super fast) I main jungle Lee and I'm half decent at him as long as I can play with a team that doesn't feed early. Cheers and have fun, hit me up for details.  {{champion:64}}  ftw

replies.body:
IGN: SoulReaperMX
Role: ADC, Supp, JG
Champ for each role: Lucian, Leona or Thresh, Trundle
Been playing since season three but havnt really played ranked want to join a team, wanna have fun but also win XD
Currently Bronze l hopefully soon to be Silver
Why is NA posting on a OCE looking for team thread... Silly americans...

Can you explain why this is your main account.

Why change from your original account, which I assume already had several champions and possibly skins/icons?

Cheers!

My old main was with mainly mid champs and ap users, low masteries and such. After I got level 4 with hecarim and level 5 with lee I just kinda went meh, lets use this one. I jungle a lot now so the champs I own this account are put to more use than on my old.
If you're over 16, feel free to add me. I'll invite you to my group if there is room when we play. If we get along, you could play with us more often.
